attributes.action: To make false allegations of domestic abuse as serious as false rape allegations
attributes.additional_details: It is very important that domestic abuse is not used as a key to get free legal aid in the family court.

rejection.details:
People can already by charged for perverting the cause of justice and wasting police time in cases of false allegations of domestic abuse. We're therefore not exactly sure what further action you'd like to see. You can find out more here: 

https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/false-allegations-rape-andor-domestic-abuse-see-guidance-charging-perverting-course
